Summary: Everynite orbs and saucer shapes not 1 or 3 more then 10,since june 2012.What is going on!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
divs: Sighting DetailsWe have been watching orbs and saucers since june.We are seeing more and more.Orbs have been in groups hovering barely over fields or in woods just above ground.Suacers hover above tree lines.They will rise and drop back down above tree lines from 2 to 30 minutes until you will see another light coming from below saucer.They look like they are picking up flying glowing objects a little bit smaller them.You might see 1 or 2 a night or you might see 10.What is going on?????????????
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in West Plains
There were no other sightings in West Plains on or around December 14th 2012
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
